messages.content: Generally you are still a “teacher” but I’m not sure 100%. I know my instructional coach role is still “teacher” contract/pay.
Debating whether this is a troll or gross overshare. Going to go with troll since you just also made a new account
I don't know why you even talk to human trash like this. Instead you should motivate him to leave her - at least that would be productive.
What's that like? Like what's the thought process? I dunno. I know what's a weird question..i just can't imagine
I never think someone is sincere when they say why “would I care if I’m being lied to” constantly?
Did you maybe get Tag and Hide and Seek confused ?
Of course I remember a time when I didn't know what calories were. I was a child.
Yeah, even though I give it to him that it was confusing that they designed Crysis 1 for PCs that wouldn't come out for like 5 years.
Oh absolutely. No way he should run in 2020. I don't know what alternatives there are though.
Op is likely young and clueless. There’s likely a reason they’re in retail.
We don't know what would have happened if she'd said no, which is why most guys wouldn't ask.
Are they dead? I don’t recall this bit of the Nativity play.
Maybe so , i just dont know about him, team has enough turmoil they just dont need any more distractions
Yeah super confused about that considering it was only [NAME] she had beef with lol
If a woman forces a man's penis into her vagina, that ABSOLUTELY IS a crime. Not sure what you're smoking.
Mexico didn't start the war. Thats probably where you are confused. The US invaded Mexico in both occasions, Mexico only defended itself in both occasions.
I hope so but doubt it...
Oh, I see what you did... Trying to confuse me.
I'd very much doubt many people believe there was no awareness or complicity.
Pretty sure you could do that with a cargo ship too, so I'm not sure I buy that argument.
Am i missing something or is this an antijoke that doesn't belong here?
Not sure why [NAME] didn't foul to stop the fast break there
Same here. I just don't understand how NOBODY at Lucasfilm said during the production, "Hey maybe this is a bad idea."
Can’t even tell what’s happening here. This isn’t cringe.
What’s populism? I’ve seen it a lot lately and it seems to have, as far as I can tell...no meaning.
Yeah, and I don’t know why, it was totally out of character for me...
Well they got removed so I’m not sure if I want to see it anyway.
Not sure if guys like that are better or worse than regular Incels.
Not sure what makes me a nimby but ok?
I doubt people are *happy*, but they probably aren’t sad about someone who was potentially endangering others through their anti-science views.
